title: Pip UI+
description: Pip UI+ aims to add some of the missing in-game tabs (such as special, perks, and so on) to the Pip-Boy 3000 Mk V. Inspired by gnargle's Stats Display.
author: @MercurialPony

meta.instructions: The 'STAT' page will now have the 'SPECIAL' tab which you can interact with.
meta.tip: Click the left knob to edit the value of an attribute.
